name: Alabama Chanin
description: Alabama Chanin is a design and production studio that focuses on responsible production and sustainable practices in fashion and textiles. While they don't explicitly state they are American Indian-owned, their history section mentions the textile legacy of the Native Chickasaw and Cherokee nations in the Shoals region. They offer workshops and have a flagship store

name: Poarch Creek Indians Museum & Gift Shop
description: This establishment offers authentic Native American items and showcases the history of the Muskogee Creek Indians. While not a spinning business, it is owned by the Poarch Band of Creek Indians and may offer handcrafted items

name: Knotted Bird Gifts at Moundville Archaeological Park and Museum
description: This gift shop at Moundville Archaeological Park offers Native American-made goods and art, including handmade shell jewelry and handcrafted flinted arrowheads. It's a place to find Native American crafts

name: Sacred Way Sanctuary
address: Florence, AL (Specific address not readily available online)
description: This facility is dedicated to the preservation of Indigenous Native American horses and offers handcrafted, Native-made items in their online gift shop, with proceeds supporting the care of the horses

name: Native Treasures
description: Native Treasures offers authentic and inspired Native American products, including apparel, jewelry, home decor, and art

name: The Taming of the Ewe
description: This is a yarn and tea boutique that offers a wide variety of yarns and teas. While not explicitly Native American-owned, it is a prominent yarn shop in Alabama

name: Southern Twist Yarns
address: Fairhope, AL 36532 (Specific street address not listed in search results, but location is Fairhope)
description: Southern Twist Yarns is a yarn store offering a variety of yarns, tools, notions, and classes

name: Clara's Loom
description: Clara's Loom is listed as a yarn store in Alabama

name: Fiber Art Works
description: Fiber Art Works is another yarn store located in Huntsville, Alabama

name: Knit Happenz
description: Knit Happenz is a yarn and craft store in Vestavia Hills, Alabama
